# scene

**Instance Property**

The scene to be displayed.

## Declaration

```swift
var scene: SCNScene? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Setting a new scene immediately replaces whatever scene the renderer was previously displaying. To display a transition between scenes, use the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNSceneRenderer/present(_:with:incomingPointOfView:completionHandler:)] method.

## Presenting a Scene

- **present(_:with:incomingPointOfView:completionHandler:)**: Displays the specified scene with an animated transition.
